name: Foster Care Services
description: AFS is committed to providing healing and equitable care to families, children, siblings, and teens in care. By becoming a resource parent (formerly known as foster parent) who opens your heart and home you can change the trajectory of a youth's life. AFS offers the following foster care services: - Enhanced Intensive Services Foster Care - Homes for Youth: SF Juvenile Probation - Intensive Services Foster Care - Kinship Care - SF Emergency Placement Program - Therapeutic Foster Care - Treatment
